title: 为什么MCBBS编辑保存帖子失败
author: MC_LengGuang
txt_content:
如题我一编辑帖子然后保存就出现

500 Internal Server Errornginx/1.2.1

replies.author: xiaojiahuo3
replies.txt_content: 我也是，据说是周末人一多就这样……

replies.author: MC_LengGuang
replies.txt_content:
xiaojiahuo3 发表于 2014-12-27 16:38

哦！知道了，谢谢

replies.txt_content: 就是，编辑个服务器帖子都没法，这mcbbs，总是这样，总是在关键时刻出问题

replies.txt_content:
